ing: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed Cheddar cheese soup
des: "This easy dish makes a great snack or appetizer. Serve over toasted white or rye bread."
ins: Pour the cheese soup and milk into a saucepan and warm over low heat, stirring to blend. Mix in the beer, Worcestershire sauce and cayenne pepper. Serve over toasted bread.
